description.ko: 구식 통신 기술 장치가 고도의 디지털 식생을 위한 양육장으로 재탄생하는 광활한 풍경화로, 차갑고 부식된 금속과 활기차고 분형(fractal)적인 생명체 사이의 대조를 강조합니다.
description.en: A vast landscape piece showing an obsolete piece of communication technology being repurposed as a nursery for advanced digital vegetation, emphasizing the contrast between cold, decaying metal and vibrant, fractal life.

prompt: An abandoned, decaying satellite dish deep in a misty valley, its rusted metal surface being overtaken by a thick layer of luminescent fractal moss and giant, translucent mushrooms with geometric gill structures. From the center of the dish, a massive orchid-like flower blooms, its petals made of shimmering, soft-pastel glass layers that pulse with faint data-streams. The surrounding air is filled with floating spores that resemble tiny, glowing polyhedral shapes. Soft lavender, mint, and pale peach color palette. 8k resolution, wide-angle cinematic shot, hyper-realistic textures of weathered metal against delicate digital flora, volumetric lighting filtering through a thick morning fog.
